entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
